# shinycalendr


The goal of shinycalendr is to provide a Shiny interface for the calendR package

## Installation

You can install the development version of shinycalendr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("NEPEM-UFSC/shinycalendr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library(shinycalendr)
run_app()
```
